name: Maria, the Grand Canals Trivia Game | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.text: Maria Canals is Cuban-American, but where was she born?
questions.explanation:
Miami, Florida.

	Maria Pilar Canals was born in 1966 in Miami, Florida.  Because of her family's origins, Canals speaks both English and Spanish, learning to speak both fluently as a young child.

questions.text: Maria Canals is perhaps best known for playing Theresa Russo on what Disney television show?
questions.explanation:
Wizards of Waverly Place.

	Maria Canals Barrera is well-known for her role as Theresa Russo, the mother on "Wizards of Waverly Place".  Theresa is a character who views herself as a "hot mom", and always tries to hog the spotlight.  "Wizards of Waverly Place" premiered in 2007, and in 2011, it became the first Disney Channel show to have more than 100 episodes.

questions.text: Maria Canals Barrera also played the role of a mother as Connie Torres on what Disney Channel movie?
questions.explanation:
Camp Rock.

	Maria Canals Barrera played Connie Torres, Mitchie's mother, in the 2008 Disney Channel movie "Camp Rock", as well as "Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam" in 2010.  Connie Torres was invited to be the chef at "Camp Rock", the summer camp Mitchie was staying at.  It was the only way they could afford to allow Mitchie to go.

questions.text: Maria Canals married David Barrera in 1999.  They had two daughters; what are their names?
questions.explanation:
Bridget and Madeleine.

	Maria Canals and David Barrera were married in 1999 and had two daughters together.  Though most of Maria Canals' family lived in Miami, she moved to Los Angeles, California with her husband.

questions.text: Maria Canals Barrera voiced a character on "Justice League" and "Justice League Unlimited".  Who did she voice?
questions.explanation:
Hawkgirl.

	Mara Canals Barrera provided the voice of Shayera Hol, who was known as Hawkgirl.  She played Hawkgirl in "Justice League" from 2001 to 2004.  She also played Hawkgirl in "Justice League Unlimited", which turned out to be very limited; and ran from 2004-2006.

questions.text: Maria Canals Barrera played Lal Pinedo in which Tom Hanks film?
questions.explanation:
Larry Crowne.

	Though Lala Pinedo did not play a major part in "Larry Crowne", she was clearly important enough to be given a first AND last name.  Maria Canals Barrera played Lala in "Larry Crowne", released in 2011.

questions.text: Maria Canals Barrera voiced an interestingly named character, the mother of LaCienega.  Her name was Sunset Boulevardez.  For what show did Maria Canals Barrera voice Sunset?
questions.explanation:
The Proud Family.

	"The Proud Family" was a Disney show that ran from 2001 to 2005.  Though Maria Canals Barrera's character was not a regular character, she did get quite a few appearances.  Sunset Boulevardez was Felix's wife and Trudy's best friend.  She was a police officer, and mother of LaCienega.

questions.text: Maria Canals Barrera provides the voice for Paulina Sanchez, a character who falls in love with the main character's alter ego.  The main character also has a huge crush on her, but she has no idea that he is the same as the alter ego she is in love with.  On what show does Barrera voice Paulina?
questions.explanation:
Danny Phantom.

	"Danny Phantom" ran from 2004-2007.  In the show, Danny Fenton has a huge crush on Paulina Sanchez, who is voiced by Maria Canals Barrera.  However Danny Fenton turns into Danny Phantom to save Paulina in one episode, so Paulina falls in love with Danny Phantom, and she has no idea that Danny Phantom and Danny Fenton are one in the same.

questions.text: Maria Canals Barrera voiced Sofia Otero in which of these "Scooby-Doo" movies?
questions.correct: Scooby-Doo! and the Monster of Mexico
options: Scooby-Doo! and the Loch Ness Monster
Scooby-Doo! and the Legend of the Vampire
questions.explanation:
Scooby-Doo! and the Monster of Mexico.

	Maria Canals Barrera voiced Sofia Otera in the "Scooby-Doo" film released in 2003.  In "Scooby-Doo! and the Monster of Mexico", Scooby Doo and the gang very inaccurately chase a bigfoot-like creature called a "chupacabra" in Mexico.  This is extremely inaccurate because the chupacabra gets its origins in Puerto Rico and it does not look like a bigfoot.

questions.text: On the Telemundo show "Marielena", who did Maria Canals Barrera play?
questions.explanation:
Nancy.

	"Marielena" was a Spanish-language telenova that was shown on the Telemundo network.  It ran from 1992-1994, and Maria Canals Barrera played Nancy on the show.
